benevolessence.description: A crystallised mass of mortal gratitude.

bloomingdale-badge.description: A mark o' Marco having travelled to Bloomingdale.

broken-blade.title: Broken Blade
broken-blade.description: A compact cutter used by Madame Couteau for creating fine cuisine.

clump-of-cloud.description: Fluffy stuff left behind by a cloudy foe.

coffinwell-badge.description: A mark o' Marco having travelled to Coffinwell.

crumpled-letter.description: A message meant for the boy Bryson from Porth Llaffan.

crumpled-note.description: A wrinkled and rather grubby piece of paper.

dirtbag.description: A bag from Jared for putting top-quality earth in.

dragon-s-tear.description: A peerless precious stone of profound blue.

drakulord-s-tooth.description: An enormous gnasher dropped by a drakulord.

driver-s-license.title: Driver's License
driver-s-license.description: A certificate to show competence in handling the Starflight Express.

drunken-dragon.title: Drunken Dragon
drunken-dragon.description: A bracing brew that Greygnarl likes to guzzle.

duneberry.title: Duneberry
duneberry.description: A desert delicacy that works wonders with the skin.

encyclopaedia-gittanica.description: A meticulous treatise on the terrible Gittish Empire.

freezing-feather.description: A polar plume that chucks out one heck of a chill.

fygg.title: Fygg

gittish-seal.description: An emblem once proudly possessed by a lieutenant of the Empire.

gleeba-badge.title: Gleeba Badge
gleeba-badge.description: A mark o' Marco having travelled to Gleeba.

goododendron.title: Goododendron
goododendron.description: A fashionable flower that's highly sought-after by slimes.

gratite.title: Gratite
gratite.description: A strange stone that makes miracles happen with heartfelt thanks.

grundies.title: Grundies
grundies.description: Phew! A pair of pants that exude a powerful pong.

guestbook.description: A list of particulars about persons staying at Erinn's inn.

hammerfang.title: Hammerfang
hammerfang.description: A fearsome fang prised from a power hammer.

heavenly-horseshoe.title: Heavenly Horseshoe
heavenly-horseshoe.description: A sure shoe for a horse's hoof.

hexite.title: Hexite
hexite.description: A mysterious mass that possesses the power of friendship.

hocus-chimaera-feather.description: Decorative down of the hocus chimaera that's loved by the ladies.

inny.title: Inny
inny.description: An award given to inncredible inntertainers.

jewellery-box.title: Jewellery Box
jewellery-box.description: A bijou box borne by birds of terrordise.

keepsake-ring.description: A precious piece of jewellery lost by an old lady.

larrrst-letter.title: Larrrst Letter
larrrst-letter.description: A letter left behind by a pirate captain.

little-key.title: Little Key
little-key.description: An old key found at the bottom of a grotto.

snowberian-badge.description: A mark o' Marco having travelled to Snowberia.
